description.short: A celebration of tech, talent, and teamwork — that’s GDGOC WOW 2025.
description.long: GDGOC WOW 2025 is an electrifying 2-day tech experience curated , bringing together passionate minds from various institutions. The event features inspiring speaker sessions, panel discussions, interactive ice-breakers, and an intense overnight hackathon that challenges participants to innovate and collaborate under pressure. With opportunities for learning, networking, and celebrating tech culture, WOW 2025 is designed to leave a lasting impact on everyone involved—whether you're a developer, designer, or enthusiast.

benefits.title: Student
benefits: Exposure to Industry Experts & Technologies, Discover new career opportunities, new skills, professional contacts
Hands-on Hackathon Experience to Boost Practical Skills, Learn how to work in a team.
Networking Opportunities with Peers and Professionals

benefits.title: entrepreneur
benefits: Connect with Potential Collaborators and Mentors
Gain Insights from Industry Leaders through Panel Discussions, Learn business tips from successful people.
Showcase Startup Ideas and Explore Partnership Avenues

benefits.title: industrial company
benefits: Brand Visibility through Sponsorships and Talks
Engage with Young Tech Talent, Connect with other companies and startups, business connections, collaborations
Opportunities to Collaborate on Innovative Projects & Hackathon Solutions, Support student innovation through sponsorship.
